p: As aforementioned, there has been a growing interest in replacing synthetics additives with natural antioxidants and antimicrobials. EOs are one of these natural additives that have been utilized as antioxidants, antimicrobials, and flavoring agents in meat and poultry products. As Gram-positive organisms are more susceptible to EOs, attention has been focused on utilizing EOs in the inhibition of Gram-positive bacteria such as L. monocytogenes in meat and poultry products.
